document.text:
From: ' 
To:' 
Subject: FW: Ghislaine Maxwell- 02879-509 
Date: Wed, 13 Oct 2021 13:32:30 +0000 
Don't think we need to bother team with this, but FYI. 
From: 
Sent: Wednesday, October 13, 2021 8:38 AM 
To: 
Subject: RE: Ghislaine Maxwell- 02879-509 
Thanks! 
> > >  " 
Hi M, 
>  10/13/2021 8:37 AM > Â» 
Yes, I relayed our last conversations to the AUSAs after we spoke. Defense counsel continues to press (with us as well) for 
delivery requirements that are inconsistent with the way we understand other defendants' mail to be treated and the way 
we typically treat mail bound for in-custody defendants. Happy to discuss by phone. 
Thanks, 
From: 
Sent: Wednesday, October 13, 2021 6:56 AM 
To: 
Subject: Fwd: Ghislaine Maxwell- 02879-509 
Did you discuss with the AUSAs about tempering expectations on the delivery of the hard drives? 
>>>  BOBBI C STERNHEIM < >  10/12/2021 10:25 AM >>> 
Good morning-
The government has sent a  hard drive to the MDC via Federal Express for Ms. Maxwell. 
Upon arrival, it must IMMEDIATELY be given to Ms. Maxwell. 
Time is of the essence. 
Please inform me when it arrives. 
Thank you-
Bobbi 
Please note my new office address and preferred email address: 
BOBBI C. STERNHEIM, ESQ. 
Law Offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim 
225 Broadway, Suite 715 
New York, NY 10007 
EFTA00016716

Main: 
Cell: 
Fax: 
This message and any attached documents contain information from the Law Offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim that may be 
confidential and/or privileged. 
If you are not the intended recipient, you may not read, copy, distribute, or use this information. 
If you have received this transmission in error, please notify the sender immediately by reply e-mail and then delete this 
message. Thank you. 
EFTA00016717
